org.infogrid.comm

Class AbstractFireAndForgetSendingMessageEndpoint<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.infogrid.comm.AbstractSendingMessageEndpoint<T>
      • org.infogrid.comm.AbstractFireAndForgetSendingMessageEndpoint<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the message type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageEndpoint<T>, SendingMessageEndpoint<T>

    public abstract class AbstractFireAndForgetSendingMessageEndpoint<T>
extends AbstractSendingMessageEndpoint<T>
    Factors out functionality common to many SendingMessageEndpoint implementations that use a "fire and forget" model.

        protected long theDeltaResend

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractFireAndForgetSendingMessageEndpoint

        protected AbstractFireAndForgetSendingMessageEndpoint(java.lang.String name,
                                                      long deltaResend,
                                                      double randomVariation,
                                                      java.util.concurrent.ScheduledExecutorService exec,
                                                      java.util.List<T> messagesToBeSent)
        Constructor for subclasses only.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the MessageEndpoint (for debugging only)
        deltaResend - the number of milliseconds until this endpoint resends the message if sending the message failed
        randomVariation - the random component to add to the various times
        exec - the ScheduledExecutorService to schedule timed tasks
        messagesToBeSent - outgoing message queue (may or may not be empty)
